entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: SSE 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
